------------------

```none
Modules are installed properly and can be found under >> /opt/microsoft/powershell/6.0.0-beta.2/Modules

```

Actual behavior
---------------

And attempting to import the module fails >>

comments.author: alexandair
comments.body:
On PowerShell Core, you need to install AzureRM.Netcore. Try:
`Install-Module AzureRM.Netcore -Score CurrentUser`

comments.author: MaximoTrinidad
comments.body:
Yes!!  Module to install in PowerShell Core is AzureRM.Netcore
Both Azure and AzureRM modules are meant for Windows PowerShell only.

Let me point out!  This is a good example when you should get an error or fail message when installing a module in the wrong PowerShelll environment.

:)

title: Install-Module Azure or AzureRM Succeeds but the modules are not found. Ubuntu 16.04 - PS 6 Beta
